materials.name: solar-panel
materials.description: A device that converts sunlight into electrical energy, typically consisting of multiple photovoltaic cells arranged in a grid-like pattern.

materials.name: regolith
materials.description: A layer of loose, heterogeneous material covering solid rock on the Moon's surface, composed of various minerals, dust, and small rocks.

materials.name: silica
materials.description: A chemical compound made of silicon and oxygen, often found in quartz and other minerals, and used as a primary material for solar cells and glass.

materials.name: ilmenite
materials.description: A titanium-iron oxide mineral found in lunar regolith, used as a source of titanium and as a potential material for oxygen extraction.

materials.name: anorthite
materials.description: A calcium aluminum silicate mineral found in lunar rocks, used as a source of aluminum and as a component in the production of ceramics and glass.

materials.name: olivine
materials.description: A magnesium iron silicate mineral commonly found in lunar basalts, used in various industrial applications and as a potential source of iron and magnesium.

materials.name: pyroxene
materials.description: A group of silicate minerals found in lunar rocks, used in ceramics and as a source of magnesium and iron.

materials.name: aluminum
materials.description: A lightweight, silver-white metal derived from minerals like anorthite, used in the construction of spacecraft and solar panel frames.

materials.name: silicon
materials.description: A semiconductor material derived from silica, used in the production of solar cells and electronic devices.

materials.name: titanium
materials.description: A strong, lightweight metal derived from minerals like ilmenite, used in aerospace and other high-performance applications.

materials.name: iron
materials.description: A common metal found in minerals like ilmenite and olivine, used in construction, machinery, and various industrial applications.

materials.name: calcium
materials.description: An alkaline earth metal found in minerals like anorthite, used in the production of cement, steel, and other materials.

materials.name: magnesium
materials.description: A lightweight metal found in minerals like olivine, used in alloys, electronics, and as a reducing agent in the production of titanium.
